divs: Sighting Details 10 pm sat may 29 2009 i had been visiting a friend in the town of deerfield il when i had decided to step outside to enjoy some fresh air while doing so i noticed it was a clear night and had been watching the sky when i spyd a slow moving bright white object that then began to increase in size to 3 or 4 times than the size at which i had originaly spotted it at at which point it held its size and carryed on through the sky for a while to then return to its original size and carry on out of sight. the object was moving from the south headed north bound it was star white in color. I im not sure as to what this object is or was but after reading a similar mufon report i had decided to post and who knows maybe one day all these reports will amount to something.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Deerfield
There were no other sightings in Deerfield on or around May 29th 2009
